basic.floral_language:
Zinnia elegans 
Floriography: warm-hearted, sunny, positive
Zinnia elegans will complete its life cycle in one year. Beautiful color. Flower shape is like a small sun, under sunlight, clustered lovely flowers especially dazzling and beautiful. In 2016, a Zinnia elegans at the International Space Station was the first flower that bloomed in the outer space.
Zinnia elegans likes sunny days, but avoid direct strong sunlight. Flowering from June to October for 3-4 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period June-October, viewing period 3-4 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, avoid strong direct light
maintenance.watering: Keep soil moist, water and drain timely
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove diseased, yellowing and dropping leaves
